name: HiMirror
0:
”Alexa, start Hi Mirror.”
”Alexa, ask HiMirror, What is my skin status ?”
”Alexa, launch Hi Mirror and turn on makeup light.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hi mirror
Developer Terms of Use
des:
HiMirror Voice Assistant (V3.2) can help you easily perform many HiMirror functions. You can say : 

- What is my skin overview? You can also say, what is my HiSkin or body overview? (If you have the HiSkin or Smart Body Scale)
- How about my pores, fine lines, weight and hydration ? (There are many other factors you can try. Just ask Alexa but pick one topic at a time!) 
- Start skin/body/hiskin measurement. 
- Turn on makeup light. Increase or decrease the brightness. Set the brightness level to 1 ~ 4 
- Add the product into BeautyBox 
- How do I contact HiMirror Customer Service? 
- But that’s not all! We created some surprising content for you to explore with HiMirror. Treat HiMirror and Alexa as your best friend and best beauty consultant.

GETTING STARTED:

This HiMirror custom Alexa feature is dedicated for the Alexa-enabled HiMirror models. To access full functionality of this feature, you must have the "HiMirror Plus +" (Device) or newer model to interact with HiMirror products by Alexa. If you have the "HiMirror or HiMirror Plus", you can find your historical skin scores and other definitive questions without controlling functions via voice or other Echo device.

If you would like to get this HiMirror feature, please click the "Enable" bottom and then complete the "Account Linking" procedure. Please enter your HiMirror account which you registered when you first purchased your HiMirror on the HiMirror official website. (https://www.himirror.com/)


To find out more product usage information and additional Help, please visit the HiMirror official website : https://www.himirror.com/support/Help


Disclaimer:
This feature does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Contact your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
